div.div: Molecular docking of the epiisipilosine alkaloid with the UP enzyme of S. mansoni.
div.p: a) 2D scheme showing the hydrogen bonds and hydrophobic interactions in the EPIIS-UP complex. b) 3D interactions by hydrogen bonds (Gln201, Met231 and Arg203) in EPIIS. c) 3D conformation of the active site of EPIIS binding in UP enzyme.
